title: Journey to Whiterun
session_summary: The party traveled from Riverwood to Whiterun, encountering signs of civil war tension along the road. They met with Jarl Balgruuf and learned about the political situation in Skyrim.
key_events: Encounter with Imperial patrol on the road
Learning about the civil war and Thalmor presence
notes: Great session! Players were engaged with the political intrigue and made good choices in how to approach the Jarl. Next session will focus on exploring Bleak Falls Barrow.
